title: Question 22:
description: Why am I blocked from claiming rewards?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: You are blocked from claiming rewards because your Collateralisation Ratio is below the required level (usually 750%, with a small buffer to allow for price fluctuations). To increase your Collateralisation Ratio, you'll need to burn enough sUSD to get your Collateralisation Ratio above 750%.

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
